weekly_challenges.title: Push-Up Challenge
weekly_challenges.description: Do 20 push-ups every day this week.

weekly_challenges.title: Squat Challenge
weekly_challenges.description: Perform 30 squats each day this week.

weekly_challenges.title: Crunch Challenge
weekly_challenges.description: Complete 40 crunches each day for a week.

weekly_challenges.title: Plank Challenge
weekly_challenges.description: Hold a plank for 1 minute every day for 7 days.

weekly_challenges.title: Jumping Jack Challenge
weekly_challenges.description: Do 50 jumping jacks every day for the next week.

weekly_challenges.title: Bicep Curl Challenge
weekly_challenges.description: Complete 15 bicep curls each day this week.

weekly_challenges.title: Burpee Challenge
weekly_challenges.description: Perform 10 burpees every day for the next 7 days.

weekly_challenges.title: Mountain Climbers Challenge
weekly_challenges.description: Do 20 mountain climbers every day for a week.

weekly_challenges.title: Lunges Challenge
weekly_challenges.description: Complete 20 lunges on each leg every day this week.
